title: marwell
author: marwell
content: Tell me a cheap hosting with a large number of domains and databases, which gives a discount when paying for several years in advance at once.I found this one so far: https://exservers.net/vps-hosting-bitcoinPaypal, I do not have the opportunity to pay, in recent months the opportunity to replenish the wallet has disappeared. Therefore, you need hosting with the ability to pay in cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: mocacinno
comments.body: Since you're looking at vps's (at least, the link you posted has vps in it's name), you could always take a look on https://lowendbox.com/They always have pretty good deals from all kind of vendors... Some accept crypto, others don't...
